title: Data Vault Breach
goal: Reach the data vault and escape with the files

rooms.name: Security Office
rooms.description: A dimly lit security office with flickering neon lights casting blue and pink hues. Monitors display static. Coffee cups and energy drink cans litter the desk. The air smells of ozone and burnt circuits.

items.name: metal filing cabinet
items.description: A four-drawer filing cabinet with label slots

items.name: security memo
items.description: A printed memo about password policies
items.text: MEMO: All employees must update passwords. New vault access requires: birth year of the replicant from that old film, the one about LA in 2019. You know which one.

items.name: encrypted datapad
items.description: A small datapad with encrypted text
items.text: LOGIN CREDENTIALS - User: admin | Pass: NEON_CITY | Server location: Router in hallway has backup codes written underneath.

items.name: cluttered desk
items.description: A desk covered in papers and tech junk

items.name: small silver key
items.description: A key with 'D' stamped on it

items.name: corporate access card
items.description: A plastic access card with a magnetic strip

items.name: elevator door
items.description: A sleek chrome elevator door with a card reader

rooms.name: Corporate Hallway
rooms.description: A sterile white hallway with LED strips running along the floor. Corporate motivational posters line the walls. A router blinks on the wall, and a maintenance panel is partially open.

items.name: network router
items.description: A wall-mounted router with blinking LEDs
items.text: Underneath the router, someone has scrawled in permanent marker: 'Server room combo - 7734' and drawn a smiley face.

items.name: maintenance access panel
items.description: A wall panel with various compartments

items.name: reinforced vault door
items.description: A massive door with a keypad and biometric scanner

password_questions.question: Enter admin username:
password_questions.hint: Check the encrypted datapad in the security office

password_questions.question: Enter password:
password_questions.hint: The encrypted note has the credentials

password_questions.question: Enter server room access code:
password_questions.hint: Look at the router in the hallway

rooms.name: Corporate Data Vault
rooms.description: You've made it! A room full of server racks humming with activity. Holographic displays float in mid-air showing streams of data. In the center, a terminal glows with the words 'DATA EXTRACTED - MISSION COMPLETE'.

items.name: main server terminal
items.description: The central data access point, now displaying your successful breach

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've breached the corporate data vault and extracted the files. Time to jack out before security arrives. You win!
